topic.title: Damaged Equipment
topic.shortdesc: If damages are made prior to returning the rented equipment, you will be charged according to the amount of damage and the price of the device.

section.title: Laptops
section.p: Minimal damage will require a $15 fee; this includes small cracks and scratches. Depending on the amount and severity of the damages, the fees will increase with the value of the device. If lost or stolen, there will be a minimum fee of $100.

section.title: iPad Pros
section.p: Minimal damage will require a $12 fee; this includes small cracks and scratches. Depending on the amount and severity of the damages, the fees will increase with the value of the device. If lost or stolen, there will be a minimum fee of $100.

section.title: Videocameras
section.p: Minimal damage will require a $10 fee; this includes small cracks and scratches. Depending on the amount and severity of the damages, the fees will increase with the value of the device. If lost or stolen, there will be a minimum fee of $100.
